Jonathan Toews

Full Name: Jonathan Toews

(Captain Serious, Tazer, JT, Johnny, J-Bone)

Position: C •  Shoots: Left

6-2, 201lb (188cm, 91kg)

Team: Winnipeg Jets

Born: April 29, 1988 in Winnipeg, Manitoba ca

Draft: Chicago, 1st round (3rd overall), 2006 NHL Entry

Amateur Teams: North Dakota

Pronunciation: \JAWN-ah-thuhn TAYVZ\

  • 3x Cup Winner
  • 2007-08 AR
  • 2009-10 Smythe
  • 2012-13 Selke
  • 1x All Star
  • 2014-15 Messier
  • NHL 100th Anniv. Team

Frequently Asked Questions

How old is Jonathan Toews?

Jonathan Toews is 37 years old.

When was Jonathan Toews born?

Jonathan Toews was born on April 29, 1988.

Where was Jonathan Toews born?

Jonathan Toews was born in Winnipeg, Canada.

How tall is Jonathan Toews?

Jonathan Toews is 6-2 (188 cm) tall.

How much does Jonathan Toews weigh?

Jonathan Toews weighs 201 lbs (91 kg).

How many goals does Jonathan Toews have?

Jonathan Toews had 372 goals over his career.

How many points does Jonathan Toews have?

Jonathan Toews had 883 points over his career.

How many Stanley Cups has Jonathan Toews won?

Jonathan Toews has won 3 Stanley Cups as a player.
